inclusion.criterion: treated previously for more than 1 month as per the RNTCP/WHO guidelines
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to give written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: co-infected with HIV, hepatitis B or hepatitis C
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: pregnant and lactating females or females of child bearing age with a urine HCG positive result 24-48 hours prior to every injection of Mw till 8 weeks
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: abnormal renal function, liver function or hematological tests
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: seriously ill and moribund patients with complications such as low lung reserve, marked tachypnoea, chronic cor pulmonale, congestive heart failure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: severely malnourished patients with body mass index (BMI) < 15
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male who was admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite. He had traveled to India 1 months ago and has not any positive history of TB vaccination.
